img_above_text:
![Wukong MindCliff 2.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/00/Wukong_MindCliff_2.jpg)
Non-White is a peculiar foe who attacks in haphazard fashion with his large thin blade. The most important thing to note is the smaller bar above his health bar: Non-White can use his blade to repeatedly block and parry your attacks, which can at times effectively give him a second health bar. Finding the right times to strike can be useful in circumventing his defenses, but you'll want to be wary of his frost and poison attacks. Stock up on both Antimiasma and Body-Warming medicine to deal with both scenarios should they arise.
img_below_text:
Expect Non-White to close the distance on you rapidly, as his most common move starts with him crouching before rolling toward you, and then sliding his blade up into a jump attack for a second strike, followed by a short pause before performing a very wide swing with his frost-enchanted blade.
![Wukong MindCliff 7.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e3/Wukong_MindCliff_7.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong MindCliff 2.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/00/Wukong_MindCliff_2.jpg)

Finding the right times to strike can be useful in circumventing his defenses, but you'll want to be wary of his frost and poison attacks. Stock up on both Antimiasma and Body-Warming medicine to deal with both scenarios should they arise."
        - Following Text: "Expect Non-White to close the distance on you rapidly, as his most common move starts with him crouching before rolling toward you, and then sliding his blade up into a jump attack for a second strike, followed by a short pause before performing a very wide swing with his frost-enchanted blade.
![Wukong MindCliff 7.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e3/Wukong_MindCliff_7.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat encounter in *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the player character engaged in a battle against the foe "Non-White." The scene highlights Non-White's aggressive and unpredictable fighting style, as described in the preceding and following text. The environment features a rocky, frost-covered arena with statues in the background, emphasizing the game's atmospheric design. The player's UI displays health, stamina, and abilities, while Non-White's health bar is visible, reinforcing the guide's focus on strategies to counter his frost and poison attacks.
